H0.text: Basutoland is now known as what. Azania

H1.text: Basutoland is now known as what. Swaziland

H2.text: Basutoland is now known as what. Botswana

H3.text: Basutoland is now known as what. Lestho

A4.text: Basutoland gained its independence from the United Kingdom on 4 October 1966 and was renamed the Kingdom of Lesotho.
